04 Nov 2019, 18:32

KIA pensioner refused to plead guilty to traffic accidents at the intersection in Berdsk
18:32 11/04/2019 0

An elderly auto-lady motivated her refusal by a low pension.

The collision of two cars occurred today, November 4, at the intersection of Krasnaya Sibir and Rogacheva streets. Faced VAZ-2114, following from the direction of "Motherland" in the forward direction, and the small Kia Picanto, moving towards and making a left turn on Rogacheva.
“According to the traffic rules, an elderly woman at KIA Pikanto was obliged to miss the WHA,” emergency commissioner Anatoly Sirotkin told the Witness website. - However, she refused to plead guilty, citing the fact that the oncoming VAZ was moving very quickly, and she did not see him.
Despite the fact that traffic police officers who arrived at the scene explained to the lady that she was wrong, the traffic violator was adamant.
According to the avarkom, an elderly auto-lady told law enforcement authorities that she would not be able to repair a car by the age of one pension, and therefore not to blame.
Now the pensioner will have to defend her principles at a “debriefing” in the regional traffic police.
